column5: I see these shirts all the time....   It was the voices that told me to go fishing! It didn't want to go! Honest!  Why Do I Fish? Don't Ask Stupid Questions! And here is a pic of the shirt I should I have Yesterday when I flipped the canoe
Does this shirt count! LMAO http://www.ofncommunity.com/forums/index.php?showtopic=45867 HH
Maybe some of you have seen this before. My wife and my oldest son bought me it for Father's Day 2 years ago.
Didn't get a picture of it last time at Bass Pro but saw one that said "If fishing was easy, it would be called your mom". I laughed and I laughed....
I saw one a few years back but sadly they didn't have any of my size left.  There was a picture a 3-4 jerkbaits on it  and it said .      "All my fishing buddies are JERKS.
i want this shirt RIG»HT» NOW
I still have that one it was a columbia shirt,they make some good fishing tees,I have about 10-12 of them
My favourite fishing shirt reads:  (sorry im on vacation and didn't bring it with me)  "Social drinker with a fishing problem"  It basically sums up my spare time.
